oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Thompson Show - Series 3, Program 20 (with Billy Walker)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Series 3, program 20 of a radio show hosted by Hank Thompson with his Brazos Valley Boys (including steel guitarist Lefty Nason) and featuring Billy Walker, to promote Hank's songbook of his Capitol recordings (songbook commercials not included). Circa 1949-1950. Studio ambience can be heard before both Billy Walker's and Lefty Nason's performances.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson; Brazos Valley Boys; Billy Walker
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart) -- Opening statement (Hank Thompson) -- The Grass Looks Greener Over Yonder (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson introduces Billy Walker -- Jealous Heart (Billy Walker) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Today (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Coquette (Lefty Nason steel guitar, Brazos Valley Boys) -- Hank Thompson talks -- Gathering Flowers For The Master's Bouquet (Hank Thompson and his Brazos Valley Boys) -- Closing statement (Hank Thompson) -- Theme (Humpty Dumpty Heart)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank; Walker, Billy, 1929-2006; Brazos Valley Boys; Nason, Lefty
